title: Okay here we go
body:
(I'm literally just copy pasting this from another post I made on a different board, It was the wrong one apparently.)

"Sooo awhile back I made a post about what we do with the PROJECT: Cores and I found out that Riot will let us trade them for orange essence which is cool. But it's one at a time, which may not be a problem for some people who maybe didn't get that many but I still have like 113 cores left and I'd rather not go through the process of disenchanting each and every one of them especially since my client is as slow as molasses. I was wondering if some from 'upstairs' could just take them off my account and just give me 226 essence. If not then I guess I'll just lose the cores and essence which I'd rather not, but as you can tell from me making this it's not the end of the world if I lose them because I'm not worried enough to go through and disenchant all of them! Any responses from the higher-ups would be coolio! <3 Thanks in advance."

replies.body:
You know what? Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and link this boards post. I think we may be able to help out.

Let me know if you have any questions. ^.^
